note.value: Ornate headpiece on f. 190v, interlace with leaves, elevated cross | Headpieces on f. 1r, black volutes and a red outline; f. 56v, with red vines and geometric motif; f. 61r, with fleur de lis and circles; ff. 86r, 93r, 143r, 146v, with knotwork motif; f. 126v, arrow motif; f.131r, volutes; f. 164r, knotwork with fleur de lis | Minor geometric and vegetative headpieces throughout, beginning on f. 7r | Zoomorphic, geometric, and vegetative decorations on f. 140r, small knot; f. 184v, red fish; ff. 188r, 189r, red vines | Decorated Greek initials throughout ff. 161r-190r | Illustration on f. 163r, bowing figure, red with green background, enclosed by a decorated red circle | llustration of a face in a decorated initial, f. 190v | Full page illustration in red ink on f. 191v, robed figure with nimbus ascending above border and decorated cross outside of border; f. 192r, red and black ink of John the Baptist holding a scroll that reads 'behold the Lamb of God', hand of God, vegetative motifs, border, Greek text
Manicule emerging from a decorated initial, f. 175r
